events.message: I filed a claim after my car was severely damaged in a collision last night on the highway.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and circumstances.
An agent has been assigned to manage your claim and will contact you shortly to gather more information.
We have officially acknowledged your claim and started processing based on the information received.
To proceed with the investigation, please submit your vehicle repair estimates and police accident report.
All requested documents, including photos of the damaged car and repair quotes, have been submitted successfully.
Our claims department has started a formal investigation into the accident and claim validity.
The investigation concluded that the accident was not your fault, and your claim is valid for coverage.
Based on assessed damages, a settlement amount has been proposed for your review and approval.
You provided positive feedback regarding the timely updates and professionalism during the claim process.
Your claim has been approved, and the payment will be processed shortly as per company policy.
The settlement payment was issued to your account today to cover the repairs of your damaged vehicle.
Your claim is now officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the entire process.
All records related to your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference if needed.
